select shop_goods_id, shop_id, shop_goods_name, shop_goods_desc, shop_goods_price, shop_goods_img_file_id, shop_goods_type, shop_goods_status, create_user_code, modify_user_code, create_time, modify_time from t_shop_goods t1, t_sys_file t2

sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_shop_goods (shop_goods_id, shop_id, shop_goods_name, shop_goods_desc, shop_goods_price, shop_goods_img_file_id, shop_goods_type, shop_goods_status, create_user_code, modify_user_code, create_time, modify_time) values (#shopGoodsId:INTEGER#, #shopId:INTEGER#, #shopGoodsName:VARCHAR#, #shopGoodsDesc:VARCHAR#, #shopGoodsPrice:VARCHAR#, #shopGoodsImgFileId:INTEGER#, #shopGoodsType:VARCHAR#, #shopGoodsStatus:VARCHAR#, #createUserCode:VARCHAR#, #modifyUserCode:VARCHAR#, #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, #modifyTime:TIMESTAMP#)

sqlMap.select:
select distinct t.shop_goods_id,t.shop_id,t.shop_goods_name, t.shop_goods_desc,t.shop_goods_price,t.shop_goods_img_file_id, t.shop_goods_type,t.shop_goods_status,t.create_user_code, t.modify_user_code,t.create_time,t.modify_time,t3.file_access_url from t_shop_goods t, t_shop_category_goods_link t1, t_shop_goods_time t2, t_sys_file t3 where t.shop_goods_id = t1.shop_goods_id and t.shop_goods_id = t2.shop_goods_id and t3.file_id = t.shop_goods_img_file_id and t.shop_goods_status = '00' and t.shop_id = #shopId:INTEGER# and t1.category_id = #categoryId:INTEGER#
t2.time_code = #timeCodeList[]#
